column27: >Thank you for inquiring about space at Commissary Connect. We have received your application and will be reviewing it over the next couple of days to find the ideal space for you to start or grow your food business. Our knowledgeable team will be in contact with you soon.
column42: ll want to be a part of the Commissary Connect community:
column60: >We are the pioneers of shared-use commissaries in Canada. We have been in business for over
column70: >, meaning we know how to run top-notch facilities.
column76: >We are the inventors of patented pay-per-use technology which operates at all our facilities. This means that at Commissary Connect, you only pay for what you use, keeping your start-up costs as
column92: >We have 5 connected facilities across the Lower Mainland with many more on the way. Once you are ready you can expand geographically across the province within months.
column108: > in Western Canada which allows you to sell to major retailers without having to build your own production facility. This was thought to be impossible before Commissary Connect.
column114: >We co-created the BC Food Hub Network with the BC Ministry of Agriculture and Food. We also have partners such as Vancity that allow us to create exclusive programs for you to succeed!
column120: >Our goal at Commissary Connect is simple, to make your business grow. When you join us, you gain access to our
column130: > built up by decades of experience in the food industry. As you can tell, Commissary Connect is not just a kitchen, it is a
column140: > that connects you to all the resources you need to successfully start and grow your food business.
column154: s of members that have started or grown at Commissary Connect:
